briefTitle: Combining Lesinurad With Allopurinol in Inadequate Responders
officialTitle: A Phase 3 Randomized, Double-Blind, Multicenter, Placebo-Controlled, Combination Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Lesinurad and Allopurinol Compared to Allopurinol Alone in Subjects With Gout Who Have Had an Inadequate Hypouricemic Response to Standard of Care Allopurinol.
summary: This study that compare the serum uric acid lowering effects, clinical benefits, and safety of lesinurad in combination with allopurinol to allopurinol alone in subjects with gout who have had an inadequate response to allopurinol.

primaryOutcome.measure: Proportion of Subjects With an sUA Level That is < 6.0 mg/dL
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: 6 Months, analysis after all subjects complete 12 months
